channel.title: Error after changing stats
channel.description:
I changed the stats of AGS and SGS because they had like 50 mil attack bonus. I also added stats to some custom items. This is the problem I get when I open RunServer.bat
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 11 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:346) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:31)[/code]
Any help appreciated. Someone said I might have used spaces instead of tabs in items.cfg but I checked and that was not the problem.

item.title: Error after changing stats
item.dc:creator: @Redemptionz Redemptionz
item.description:
@Redemptionz wrote:

Thanks, was not enough numbers inputted for a specific spot. My Morrigan Javelins had 8 instead of 15 numbers =\

Fixed now though

Read full topic

item.title: Error after changing stats
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

It is definitely a problem with your spaces or maybe not enough numbers inputted for a specific spot.

Read full topic
